p:
Famciclovir is a diacetyl 6-deoxy analogue of penciclovir. Oral famciclovir is rapidly absorbed and achieves a bioavailability of 77%.
51 Famciclovir is metabolized into penciclovir, reaching peak plasma penciclovir concentrations within 1 hour. Because of extensive hepatic metabolism, virtually no famciclovir is detectable in plasma.
51 Famciclovir is excreted renally as penciclovir and its 6-deoxy precursor.
9
